title: Ssh key resource
description: Generate and manage a ssh private/public key.

keyType.description: The type of key to create (the encryption algorithm used). This corresponds to the -t flag of ssh-keygen. This value defaults to ed25519.

comment.description: Comment to add to the ssh key. Changing this value will not re-create the ssh key

fileName.description: Specifies the filename of the key file. This corresponds to the -f flag of ssh-keygen

bits.description: Specifies the number of bits in the key to create. This corresponds to the -b flag of ssh-keygen.

passphrase.description: The passphrase to use. This parameter is required. To set an empty password set the value to the empty string: ""

folder.description: The folder to generate the ssh key in. Defaults to `$HOME/.ssh`
